articles.title: Sisters aged 9 and 4 crashed a car they stole because they wanted to 'swim with dolphins' - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The parents of two American girls were horrified and shocked to learn their kids had sneaked out of the family home in West Jordan in Utah in the middle of the night.
articles.content: Two young American girls stole their parents' car so that they could drive from Utah to California, a distance of over 1,000 kilometres, to go to the beach and "swim with dolphins," authorities said.… [+2937 chars]

articles.title: Marvel reveals new Filipino American hero inspired by Captain America - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Meet Ari Agbayani, Marvel's new Captain America-inspired hero.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, June 5) Filipino American Ari Agbayani is Marvel's newest addition to its growing list of heroes.
